Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cell (R-SOC) has been attracting considerable attention as a technology capable of power generation and CO2 electrolysis.
Titulo: Study on the 4-channel micro-monolithic design with geometry control for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: In addition to new material development, innovation in structural design is also a decisive factor.
Titulo: Study on the 4-channel micro-monolithic design with geometry control for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: In this study, a 4-channel micro-monolithic design, in the form of a tear-drop inner channel structure, was successfully developed.
Titulo: Study on the 4-channel micro-monolithic design with geometry control for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The micro-monolith obtained includes plurality of micro-channels growing from multiple directions and spongy active regions near the exterior surface.
Titulo: Study on the 4-channel micro-monolithic design with geometry control for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Uniquely, the irregular tear-drop inner channels further increase the proportion of the electrochemically active region to the overall circumference, achieving more efficient utilization of the geometric surface area.
Titulo: Study on the 4-channel micro-monolithic design with geometry control for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Such micro-structured cells with Ni-YSZ/YSZ/YSZ-LSM materials exhibited effective performance in the reversible operation of R-SOC.
Titulo: Study on the 4-channel micro-monolithic design with geometry control for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: A superior performance of 1.20 W center dot cm(-2) at 800 degrees C for H-2 fuel cell was demonstrated.
Titulo: Study on the 4-channel micro-monolithic design with geometry control for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Similarly, during the electrolysis of CO2, current density recorded by the cells reached 1.20 A center dot cm(-2) at 1.5 V and 800 degrees C , which is competitive compared with the values of the previous design investigations.
Titulo: Study on the 4-channel micro-monolithic design with geometry control for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Relatively low diffusion polarization shown in electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) suggests that this is due to the very gas transfer resistance in the fuel electrode.
Titulo: Study on the 4-channel micro-monolithic design with geometry control for reversible solid oxide cell

Sentencas: This novel multi-channel micro-monolithic structure shows a potential to substitute the conventional tubular counterpart.
Titulo: Study on the 4-channel micro-monolithic design with geometry control for reversible solid oxide cell
